Module downfall
Package downfall.fx

Class SimpleTableEditor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.VBox
              • downfall.fx.SimpleTableEditor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of item that is edited in the SimpleTableEditor.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class SimpleTableEditor<T>
extends javafx.scene.layout.VBox
    JavaFX GUI element that contains a table, content of which can be edited with add and remove actions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleTableEditor

        public SimpleTableEditor()
        Default constructor sets items and fetcher and columns to null.

      • SimpleTableEditor

        SimpleTableEditor​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<T> items,
                  Fetcher<T> fetcher)
        Constructor that sets columns to null
        Parameters:
        items - Items to be displayed by the TableView.
        fetcher - A fetcher that will be used when adding new items to the list. This fetcher should be initialized before providing it to the SimpleTableEditor.

      • SimpleTableEditor

        SimpleTableEditor​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<T> items,
                  Fetcher<T> fetcher,
                  javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<T,​?>... columns)
        Parameters:
        items - items to be displayed by the TableView
        fetcher - A fetcher that will be used when adding new items to the list. This fetcher should be initialized before providing it to the SimpleTableEditor.
        columns - columns that will be added to the TableView

    • Method Detail

      • getTableView

        public javafx.scene.control.TableView<T> getTableView()
        Lightweight accessor.
        Returns:
        tableView that is used inside

      • setItems

        public void setItems​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<T> items)
        Lightweight mutator. Sets items directly into the TableView
        Parameters:
        items - items to be set to the TableView.

      • setFetcher

        public void setFetcher​(Fetcher<T> fetcher)
        Lightweight mutator.
        Parameters:
        fetcher - fetcher whose retrieve method will be used to generate new items when adding them to the TableView
